name: nosql-security-monitor

scripts.start: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && node server.js
scripts.dev: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && nodemon server.js
scripts.kill-ports: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:3002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true

author: Security Team
description: Real-time NoSQL injection detection and AI-powered incident reporting system
